enb_long_title: Seventeenth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
section_title: ADOPTION OF THE DRAFT REPORT OF THE SIXTEENTH SESSION
sentences: Under this agenda item, participants commented that the report did not reflect the length of the discussions during the sixteenth IPCC Plenary session in Montreal, Canada.

They noted that the terms of reference for the Task Force on National Greenhouse Gas Inventories approved at the sixteenth session were only the interim terms of reference, since the final ones would be discussed at this seventeenth session.
The draft report was then adopted.
